code: var Joi=require("joi");var contact_schema=Joi.object({mail_sender:Joi.string().email({tlds:{allow:false}}).required().messages({"string.email":"Invalid email","string.empty":"Please insert an email"}),mail_content:Joi.string().min(20).max(10000).required().messages({"string.max":"Your email cant exceed 10 000 characters","string.min":"Your email must be at least 20 characters long","string.empty":"Your message can't be empty"})});export{contact_schema};
